originalText.text: Dr. Kossowan is a kind, attentive and expert orthodontist.  My Invisalign treatment went smoothly and I am very happy with the results.  I can't recommend her highly enough.

text.text: Dr. Kossowan is a kind, attentive and expert orthodontist.  My Invisalign treatment went smoothly and I am very happy with the results.  I can't recommend her highly enough.

originalText.text:
Dr. Kossowan is a fantastic orthodontist and you feel sure you’re getting the best treatment possible.
There are no shortcuts taken or false promises made - just the best advice and top level care.
I would definitely recommend her to my friends and family (and you if you are reading this and considering her services!).

text.text:
Dr. Kossowan is a fantastic orthodontist and you feel sure you’re getting the best treatment possible.
There are no shortcuts taken or false promises made - just the best advice and top level care.
I would definitely recommend her to my friends and family (and you if you are reading this and considering her services!).

originalText.text: When it comes to a professional, loving and attentive dental service, Dr. Kossowan exudes it with pride. She took care of me as if I was her own child. I needed extensive work when it came to getting the smile I wanted. From the start she created a plan and committed to it to the very end, even through a pandemic. I moved from New York, even through that they were VERY patient with me. I cant thank Dr. Kossowan enough for making my dream smile come true. I sometimes still cant believe this smile is all me. Even helped me with the whitening process. DR. KOSSOWAN IS THE BEST!

originalText.text: excellent service, thorough follow through on progressing with my Invisalign treatment. Partnered very well with another Dr for separate procedure to ensure my need are met. Highly recommended as an attentive and caring Orthodontist!

text.text: excellent service, thorough follow through on progressing with my Invisalign treatment. Partnered very well with another Dr for separate procedure to ensure my need are met. Highly recommended as an attentive and caring Orthodontist!

originalText.text: My experience with Dr. Kossowan has been nothing short of great!  She is meticulous and works hard to achieve your orthodontic goals- all with the most pleasant and personable demeanor possible.  She has very high standards for her work and endeavors to make your orthodontic treatment as effective as possible.  If you become her patient, you will definitely end up with beautifully straightened teeth and the best smile you could possibly have.  Although I don't have children, I think that With Dr. Kossowan's pleasant personality and sense of humor, she would make an ideal orthodontist for kids.
